snippet.title: The Last 47 Hours Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Last 47 Hours is a visual novel produced by the independent game production team Lingtan Studio. 
A short healing story depicting how people face the natural disaster and strive to overcome fear
with the help of white lies and human love.

In this game, players will click to keep the text, graphics and sound moving. 
It has 1 main characters with her own voice actors and character sprites (立ち絵 tachi-e),
more than 4 special event CGs and a screenplay with up to 30 thousands words.
